com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.servlet

Class ServletUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.servlet.ServletUtil

  • public final class ServletUtil
extends Object
    Utility class to provide http servlet functionality.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEVELOPER_MODE_ERROR_HANDLING
      The key used to look up the WComponent Configuration flag for developer mode error handling.
      static String ENABLE_SUBSESSIONS
      The key used to look up the WComponent Configuration flag for whether we should use enable sub-session support.
      static String HANDLE_ERROR_WITH_FATAL_ERROR_PAGE_FACTORY
      The key used to look up the WComponent Configuration flag for whether we should use the ErrorPageFactory.

    • Method Detail

      • isEnableSubSessions

        public static boolean isEnableSubSessions()
        Returns:
        true if enable sub sessions

      • checkResourceRequest

        public static boolean checkResourceRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                    throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                           IOException
        Check if the request is for a resource (eg static, theme...).
        Parameters:
        request - the http servlet request.
        response - the http servlet response.
        Returns:
        true to continue processing
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - a servlet exception
        IOException - an IO Exception

      • processRequest

        public static void processRequest(HttpServletHelper helper,
                                  WComponent ui,
                                  InterceptorComponent interceptorChain)
                           throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                  IOException
        This method does the real work in servicing the http request. It integrates wcomponents into a servlet environment via a servlet specific helper class.
        Parameters:
        helper - the servlet helper
        ui - the application ui
        interceptorChain - the chain of interceptors
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - a servlet exception
        IOException - an IO Exception

      • isStaticResourceRequest

        public static boolean isStaticResourceRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Parameters:
        req - the request being processed
        Returns:
        true if requesting a static resource

      • handleStaticResourceRequest

        public static void handleStaticResourceRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Handles a request for static resources.
        Parameters:
        request - the http request.
        response - the http response.

      • isThemeResourceRequest

        public static boolean isThemeResourceRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Parameters:
        req - the request being processed
        Returns:
        true if requesting a theme resource

      • handleThemeResourceRequest

        public static void handleThemeResourceRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
                                       throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                              IOException
        Serves up a file from the theme.
        Parameters:
        req - the request with the file name in parameter "f", or following the servlet path.
        resp - the response to write to.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - on error.
        IOException - if there is an error reading the file / writing the response.

      • createInterceptorChain

        public static InterceptorComponent createInterceptorChain(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Creates a new interceptor chain to handle the given request.
        Parameters:
        request - the request to handle
        Returns:
        a new interceptor chain for the request.

      • handleError

        public static void handleError(HttpServletHelper helper,
                               Throwable throwable)
                        throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                               IOException
        Called if a Throwable is caught by the top-level service method. By default we display an error and terminate the session.
        Parameters:
        helper - the current servlet helper
        throwable - the throwable
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - a servlet exception
        IOException - an IO Exception
